name: TVElementPosition
desc: Location of an element relative to the screen or its containing element.

items.name: case undefined
items.desc: The position has not been defined.

items.name: case center
items.desc: Position the element in the center of its containing element.

items.name: case top
items.desc: Position the element at the top of the containing element.

items.name: case bottom
items.desc: Position the element at the bottom of the containing element.

items.name: case left
items.desc: Position the element along the left side of the containing element.

items.name: case right
items.desc: Position the element along the right side of the containing element.

items.name: case topLeft
items.desc: Position the element in the top-left of the containing element.

items.name: case topRight
items.desc: Position the element in the top-right of the containing element.

items.name: case bottomLeft
items.desc: Position the element in the bottom-left of the containing element.

items.name: case bottomRight
items.desc: Position the element in the bottom-right of the containing element.

items.name: case header
items.desc: Position the element in the header area of the containing element.

items.name: case footer
items.desc: Position the element in the footer area of the containing element.

items.name: case leading
items.desc: Position the element in the leading edge of the containing element.

items.name: case trailing
items.desc: Position the element in the trailing edge of the containing element.

items.name: case topLeading
items.desc: Position the element in the top-leading edge of the containing element.

items.name: case topTrailing
items.desc: Position the element in the top-trailing edge of the containing element.

items.name: case bottomLeading
items.desc: Position the element in the bottom-leading edge of the containing element.

items.name: case bottomTrailing
items.desc: Position the element in the bottom-trailing edge of the containing element.
